attributes.additional_details:
The goal of this campaign is to demonstrate to Government how important it is that 4G LTE comes to Britain as soon as possible, and we would like your support in helping us do that.  We want to bring 4G LTE to the UK as soon as possible, by allowing mobile operators to use existing spectrum for 4G LTE services and ensure the auction and release of new spectrum for 4G LTE is not delayed any further.
As an individual, you will benefit from faster mobile speeds.

4G is significantly delayed in the UK.  The auction and release of new spectrum for 4G LTE services is behind schedule, threatening to make the UK among the last in Europe to rollout 4G LTE.
http://www.ofcom.org.uk/about/what-is-ofcom/statutory-duties-and-regulatory-principles/
